mapper.select: select f.code, f.order_code, o.date, o.client_code, c.name as client_name, o.material, m.name, m.group_id, co.group_name, m.code_id, co.code_id, m.inprice, f.line_code, l.name as line_name, l.place, uph, f.active from FAC_INFO f left outer join ORDERS o ON o.code = f.order_code left outer join MAPD m ON o.material = m.code left outer join LINE l ON l.code = f.line_code left outer join CLIENT c ON o.client_code = c.code left outer join COMMON_CODE co ON m.group_id = co.group_id and m.code_id = co.code_id WHERE f.code = #{code}

when.if: AND o.date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND NOW()

if.test: search.searchKeyword neq null and search.searchKeyword.toString() neq ''

when.test: search.date neq null and search.date.toString() neq ''
search.betweenDateLeft neq null and search.betweenDateLeft.toString() neq '' and search.betweenDateRight neq null and search.betweenDateRight.toString() neq ''
search.betweenDateLeft neq null and search.betweenDateLeft.toString() neq ''
search.betweenDateRight neq null and search.betweenDateRight.toString() neq ''

mapper.select: SELECT code FROM ORDERS WHERE material = #{material} order by code limit 0, 1
SELECT code FROM WAREHOUSE_HISTORY WHERE code LIKE '%OUT%' ORDER BY code DESC LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT warehouse FROM STOCK_VIEW WHERE code LIKE #{material} AND total > 0 limit 0, 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAC_INFO (code, order_code, line_code, uph) VALUES (#{code}, #{order_code}, #{line_code}, ${uph})
mapper.select: SELECT code FROM FAC_INFO ORDER BY code DESC LIMIT 0, 1

select f.code, f.order_code, o.date, o.client_code, c.name as client_name, o.material, m.name, m.group_id, co.group_name, m.code_id, co.code_id, m.inprice, f.line_code, l.name as line_name, l.place, uph, f.active from FAC_INFO f left outer join ORDERS o ON o.code = f.order_code left outer join MAPD m ON o.material = m.code left outer join LINE l ON l.code = f.line_code left outer join CLIENT c ON o.client_code = c.code left outer join COMMON_CODE co ON m.group_id = co.group_id and m.code_id = co.code_id
ORDER BY code

SELECT s.code, s.name, s.total FROM STOCK_VIEW s LEFT OUTER JOIN MAPD m ON s.code = m.code LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON m.group_id = c.group_id AND m.code_id = c.code_id WHERE m.group_id = #{group_id}
